Package chat_room.server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllClientsMaintainer
    Used by the singleClientHandler objects in in order to keep track of the clients participating in the chat room
    ConnectServerBtn
    A button for a server to connect
    DisconnectServerBtn
    A button for disconnecting a server
    ParticipantsLimitField
    A field for limiting the number of participants in the chat room
    ParticipantsLimitFieldListener
    A listener for a participants-limit-field
    Server
    Accepts clients to the chat room and creates a singleClientHandler for each in order to read messages from each one and then broadcast to all clients in the chat room
    SingleClientHandler
    Created by the server.
